Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: J. Santos
Reviews.Content: I purchased two batteries for the XPRO1 and I had no problem despite the low price. So far so good.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 2350 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Fujifilm NP-95 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 2350 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for Fujifilm X100S Digital Camera and Fujifilm NP-95
